Title: PetroChina submits lowest offers for Pakistan LNG’s two-cargo June tender
Description: State-owned PetroChina submitted the lowest offers for two June cargoes that Pakistan LNG (PLL) sought through a tender that closed on May 11.
Author: CK

Title: Venture Global agrees 20-year 1 mtpa LNG supply deal with Petronas from Plaquemines
Description: US project developer Venture Global has signed a deal to sell 1 mtpa of LNG from its 20 mtpa Plaquemines LNG project in Louisiana over a 20-year term to Malaysia’s state-owned Petronas.
Author: CK

Title: Pertamina offers one LNG cargo loading in June at Bontang
Description: Indonesia’s state-owned Pertamina is offering one cargo that will load on either June 6-10 or 17-18 at its 11.5 mtpa Bontang LNG export plant through a tender closing tomorrow. Bids are expected to remain valid until May 31.
Author: CK

Title: Japan’s LNG stock levels in early May rise, edging above year-earlier end-May levels
Description: LNG stocks held by Japan’s power utilities climbed above the 2 mt mark at the end of the first week of May, edging above end-May levels last year and the average for end-May between 2017 and 2020
Author: CK

Title: Kuwait to receive first Russian LNG cargo since 2018 as LNG imports surge before summer
Description: Kuwait is scheduled to receive its first LNG cargo from Russia this month, making it the first cargo imported from the country  since September 2018.
Author: CK
